00101     class Agent : public TREX::transaction::graph {
00102     public:
00109       typedef std::multimap< double, reactor_id,
00110                           std::greater<double> > priority_queue;

00337       void sendRequest(boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &g) {
00338        TREX::transaction::goal_id tmp(new TREX::transaction::Goal(g));
00339        sendRequest(tmp);
00340       }
00351       size_t sendRequests(boost::property_tree::ptree &g);

00354        return m_clock->tickDuration();
00355       }
00356       
00357       TREX::transaction::TICK timeToTick(time_t secs, suseconds_t usecs=0) const {
00358        return m_clock->timeToTick(secs, usecs);
00359       }
00360       double tickToTime(TREX::transaction::TICK cur) const {
00361        return m_clock->tickToTime(cur);
00362       }

00365       class AgentProxy :public TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor {
00366       public:
00367        AgentProxy(Agent &agent)
00368          :TREX::transaction::TeleoReactor(&agent, "", 0, 0) {}
00369        ~AgentProxy() {}
00370        
00371        bool postRequest(TREX::transaction::goal_id const &g) {
00372         if( !isExternal(g->object()) )
00373             use(g->object());
00374         if( isExternal(g->object()) )
00375             return postGoal(g);
00376         else
00377             syslog("ERROR")<<"Unable to subscribe to "<<g->object();
00378         return false;
00379        }
00380 
00381       private:
00382        bool synchronize() {
00383          return true;
00384        }
00385 
00386       };
